name: hw1
description: Full-Stack Development is combining the front and back ends of development into one process. Front-end consists of development of the interfaces the user will interact with, such as the HTML, CSS, and event listeners. Back-end consists of developing the connections and databases for the site. Back-end typically consists of more scripting and functionality testing whereas front-end will consist more of user testing and examination of the best ways to interact with the site.
